name: Ruby Bridges
description:
This is an entry to the LSUS 2018 Game Jam with the theme 'Parallel Dimensions.'

Ruby Bridges is a game about finding your way through difficulties and finding an alternate or different path through them.

This game can be played with Xbox controllers or Keyboard, but a gamepad is preferred.

Credits:

Programming:
Nolan Baker
Trey Cockrell
John Hawley

Art:
Baron Capers
Nolan Baker

Music/Sound:
Nolan Baker

Level Design:
Trey Cockrell

Writing and Story Direction:
James Stewart
